name: FlyTeam
about: FlyTeam is a renowned EASA-approved flight school located in Hungary, operating at Szeged Airport and Budapest Tököl Airport. As the first EASA-approved Flight School ATO in the Middle-Europe region, we offer a comprehensive range of courses including EASA Private Pilot License, Commercial Pilot License, Instrument Rating, and Multi-Engine Piston Class Rating. Our multicultural learning environment attracts students from around the world, providing a unique intercultural competency. We pride ourselves on a 99.5% successful CAA exam performance and a reliable fleet maintained by our EASA 145 approved Aircraft Maintenance Centre. Our carrier-oriented training programs, including an Airline Job Interview Course, ensure 100% of our students achieve their goals and become successful airline pilots. With a focus on safety, innovation, and customer satisfaction, FlyTeam is dedicated to creating professional and safety-conscious flight crew members.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Airline Transport Pilot
Flight Instructor - Multi-Engine (MEI)
Multi-Crew Cooperation Course (MCC)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating
Night Rating
EASA ATPL Ground School
EASA ATPL Ab Initio"]
